title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.44 - Observation decks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1263.44 - Observation decks

State Regulations

The fee for admission upon the observation decks at

Newark Airport shall be 10 cents; provided, however, that there shall be no fee
for such admission in the case of children under 12 years of age accompanied by
an adult and that such children shall not be admitted upon such observation
decks unless so accompanied. Image
